ShortDescription.Value: Disable overlays when selecting assets, in addition to more quality of life features.

Publish.LongDescription:
# Toggle Overlays and Info-Views
Tired of closing info-views every time you select an asset? This mod is for you!
## Features * Selecting assets no longer opens their respective info-views. * Info-view overlay color is now dark grey instead of white. * Clicking the info-view button (or hotkey) while having an asset selected will open the asset's info-view automatically. (optional, ON by default) * Switching to another asset automatically enables that asset's info-view. (optional, ON by default) * Switching to another asset will close the active info-view if does not match the asset. (optional, OFF by default)
This is a very simple mod, but it will leave you wondering how on earth have you been playing the game without it.
Publish.ChangeLog:
# v1.1.0 ## New Infoview Filter Toggle * Added a new button at the top of the infoview panel that lets you toggle the filter that infoviews have on the map without closing the infoview completely. * Added a new hot-key to quickly toggle the infoviews' filter. Default hot-key is Ctrl+T
## New Color Options * Added a new colorblind option to automatically convert all infoviews' colors into ones that match the selected colorblind condition's range. * Added a new option that makes the background color a light grey during daytime, as opposed to a dark grey all the time.
